Detailed Description

Stores general information about the central directory.

Member Function Documentation

bool CZipCentralDir::Info::NeedsZip64 (  )  const [inline, protected]

Gets a value indicating if the current archive properties requires the Zip64 format.

Returns:
true, if the Zip64 is needed; false otherwise.
See also:
Zip64 Format: Crossing the Limits of File Sizes and Number of Files and Segments

Definition at line 149 of file ZipCentralDir.h.

Member Data Documentation

ZIP_U32_U64 CZipCentralDir::Info::m_uEndOffset

The position of the End of Central Directory Record.

In the Zip64 it points to the Zip64 counterpart.

Definition at line 79 of file ZipCentralDir.h.

ZIP_U16_U32 CZipCentralDir::Info::m_uLastDisk

The number of the disk with the End of Central Directory Record.

This is the total number of disks in a segmented archive.

Definition at line 85 of file ZipCentralDir.h.

Definition at line 88 of file ZipCentralDir.h.

ZIP_U32_U64 CZipCentralDir::Info::m_uSize

The size of the central directory.

This value is valid only if m_bOnDisk is true; in other cases use the GetSize method instead.

Definition at line 94 of file ZipCentralDir.h.

ZIP_U32_U64 CZipCentralDir::Info::m_uOffset

The offset of the start of the central directory with respect to the starting disk number.

It is the value written in the central directory record. This value is valid only if m_bOnDisk is true.

Definition at line 101 of file ZipCentralDir.h.

ZIP_U16_U32 CZipCentralDir::Info::m_uEnd64Disk

The number of the disk with Zip64 End of Central Directory Record.

Definition at line 104 of file ZipCentralDir.h.

bool CZipCentralDir::Info::m_bOnDisk

This value is true if the central directory is physically present in the archive; false otherwise.
